channel.title: angel on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Here's how to do it
item.description: Go, read Ben Barren’s post on " Who Will Fund Local Web 2.0 Aussie Businesses?" and replace Australia everywhere with Ireland. It’s a simple formula, I believe it can work. Anything is better than where we are right now. When your VC activity is mentioned in the same sentence as Romania, you know you have a deep deep problem to solve. A report onour visit to London Open Coffee coming later.
